alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cimarron County through 1000 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Wheeless, or 14 miles west of Boise City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boise City, Wheeless, Black Mesa Park and Felt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma.
